title: CV
text:
Jurčišinová, V., Želinský, T., Forbes C.S. and Ng, J.W.J. (2025) The Mediating Role of Financial Well-Being in the Relationship Between Housing Affordability and Mental Health. Scientific Reports.
Johnson, K.T., Powell, L. McGuigan, N., De Jonge, A. Brown, K., Forbes, C.S., Plahe, J. and Tello, E. (2025) Startrack Holdings: a case of inclusive leadership and decision-making.In Cases and Exercises on Sustainability Accounting, pp. 181–192, Edward Elgar Publishing.
Cooper A., Simpson, D., Kennedy, L., Forbes, C. and Vehtari, A. (2025) Cross-validatory model selection for Bayesian autoregressions with exogenous regressors, Bayesian Analysis, 20(2). (ABDC Rank A, Group 2.)
Cooper A., Vehtari, A., Forbes, C., Simpson, D. and Kennedy, L. (2024) Bayesian cross-validation by parallel Markov chain Monte Carlo, Statistics and Computing, 34(119). (ABDC Rank A, Group 2.)

title: About Me
text:
I am a Professor of Econometrics at Monash University in Melbourne, Australia. In addition to researching and teaching topics in Bayesian inference and data analysis, I am also currently Deputy Head of and Director of Education for the Department of Econometrics and Business Statistics.



I hold a PhD in Mathematical Statistics from The Ohio State University.
